Blog.post: Hey i watched the new hp movie and it was so ccccccooooollllllll i mean i started to find sum clues bout what i think that hermoine and ron like each other. Anyway it wasnt that scary but it was so cool and amazing. I think that Daniel Radcliffe and Emma Watson was so cute when they were chased by the warewolf look at them harry like well hold hermoine and when buckbeack was being chopped of did anyone notice hermoine cried onto ron's shoulders not harry's mm i wonder why?>>>>Thia

Yesterday well explaining nya kaya gimana ya. kan ada pengajian its not that bad cumang ada laki laki nya itu loh gak enak nya. Kaya guydgj Gangguin aku ma temen temen ku ihh sebel deh they always ruin the fun but you cant live without them. Mereka itu bodh banget tapi seru nya bff aku (windhi) matiin lampu truss kita kaya pokoknya fun banget.
The last day of school just became so much worse. My brother's friend came over to my house today. IIIHHHH sebel banget. Why cant boys be normal

Ok today is the most special day of my life. SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOLLLLLLLLL ISSSSSSSS OOOOOOUUUUTTTTTTT. No more studies no more teachers no nothing. Just well mmm ok i hadnt found out what to do in my summer yet. The last day of school is not so bad but im gonna miss all my school friends like aya, rayan, nada and marianna. Well at least i can still spend time with my best friends. The worse thing about the last day is i have to go to the dentist. Changed my bracess well anyway school is out.

ok im 13 (almost anyway) and i made 2 stories already but the second one isnt finished yet im just in chapter 3. Let me tell you sum of the story anyway. Ok its about this girl her name is Tammy who lost her best best best friend which is her twin brother. His name is ross and ross died from lung cancer. Tammy is very upset and mad and everythin and her other best friend Lynn and Travis helps her to find her way back to the light. They were also crushed but not like Tammy. But now her parents are constantly fighting and thinking of getting a divorce. To avoid more sadness her parents sent her to rome to be with her brother and sister(Tommy and Karen). Then she meets this really cool guy who looks exactly like her brother named Antonio. but now Travis is jealous and Lynn is mad because she didnt spend much time with her and Travis thinks Tammy likes Anton because he looks like Ross and she doesnt truly like him. Tammy was all angry then she founds out Anton was cheating on her and Travis was right and she felt sick and fainted and went into a coma. I wont tell you anything about the end:p

Its dark and no ones around its quiet cause no one is making a sound where am I now where are you IM alone in the dark I want to go back go back in time I want you to see what you done to me see how much it hurts and feel what I feel alone in the dark if I take back time and make it mine will you stop haunting my mind because if you IM alone in the dark This is my poem i made it myself and if ya dont believe me curse you all (just kiddin)

Hey if anyone wants to know my favorite websites heres a list of my top 10: 10.www.cartoonnetwork.com 9.www.cosmogirl.co.id 8.www.neopets.com 7.www.claires.com 6.www.hilaryduff.com.au 5.www.thesims.com 4.www.gadis-online.com 3.www.tvtome.com 2.www.disneychannel.com 1.www.blogger.com all of them are really cool especially disneychannel.com if you go to the lizzie mcguire thing there are lots of cool quizes. try em if u want

Exams were not at all very very extremely hard. Math was hard and english was easy all that. ~~~~~~FFFFFFIIIIIIINNNNNNNNAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLZZZZZZzz~~~~~~ They are driving me super crazy and all. Tomorow is my best friend's birthday and on thursday (where i am its a weekend) have to go to school for my last final its for social studies. I bet it'll be okay i guess. Tapi ya untungnya aku uda dapet kado buat bff aku tapi ngasih nya kapan ya. Bentar lagi pergi balik ke indo and bahasa indo ku agak gimana ya rusak or sunthin like that. Nanti pasti deh aku kangen ma temen teman aku kaya mm lia, windhi and icha bff aku nanti ketemu lagi gak ya. Aku tak tau sih tapi kalau kangen ma ehm ehm ill kill my self or do sumthin freaky. BTW back in english in my school there is this cool guy his name is anas. Aduh aku gebetan banget ma dia gak begitu cakep sih but he doesnt even know im alive!!!!!!!!!!

Ok so im 13 but hey i give good advice. If anyone has a problem with their lives or anyone at all and need advice im there

What i think of my achivement.....i dunno. I never achived anything. My highest goal is not even as close as the peak of a mountain. At school mmm my science project one a prize in the sixth grade. Its not worth taking a real big risk if you dont get rewarded. Ok so i achived in more important things like life. I have great friends i love all of them thats the only thing im good at. Anyway guess theres no point in moaning. As they say if it aint broken dont fix it.

dear blog this is the 10nth time i tried making a blog and it finally worked. This is just an introduction. My name is thia im from indonesia but i live in abu-dhabi. I have a brother an stupid one unfortunately. I like comedy and i like making poems and stories so mm enjoy:)
